sources.source: https://support.google.com/merchants/answer/7052112 - Product data specification - Google Merchant Center Help

content.language_consistency: Use the same language for all attributes in a feed
content.attribute_naming: Use English for attribute names and supported values (e.g., condition values: new, refurbished, used)
content.attribute_format: Use underscore for multi-word attribute names (e.g., image_link)
content.free_form_text: For non-supported value attributes (title, description), use consistent language throughout feed
